name: King David
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Phortion.KingDavid

It is the RTS game about the life of King David, The second king of Israel and the servant of God

Dialogues based on King James version Bible.

Choose your troops and assign them. Set flags on advantageous positions then your troops will stop there and destroy your enemies. 

Build barracks and produce provisions. So prepare the enemies' rush.

Get thirty Mighty Warriors of David.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Phortion.KingDavid
